channel.title: Drum machine version 2
channel.description: After mackemints drummachine with FM synthdrums, which you can find [here](http://community.axoloti.com/t/5-instrument-drum-machine-slaves-to-midi/458), I thought 37% CPU was too much to add this to an integral synt-arp-rythm machine that I'm working on. So I put a couple of samples on the SD card (sorry I cannot upload). And simplified mackemints patch to this: drum machine_v2.axp (26.1 KB) Six samples, 4 patterns, CPU down to 9%. Sounds steady to me. I thought I'd share. Let me know what you think. Is this the right approach? I'd like to add changing velocity per step, and introducing some swing.

item.title: Drum machine version 2
item.dc:creator: @mackemint Markus Kaczmarek
item.description:
@mackemint wrote:

Alright, I'm happy you made something new from my little experiment.
Well done!

Read full topic

item.title: Drum machine version 2
item.dc:creator: @JSZ
item.description:
@JSZ wrote:

Depends on what you like. I personally like a drum synth more than a sample player because of the tweakability. But a lot of sounds just can't be made without samples. So maybe the best way for me would be to combine both worlds.

Read full topic
